SELECT A.RGST_ID as rgstId, A.PRCT_TO_DT as prctToDt, A.PRCT_TITL as prctTitl, A.PRCT_FROM_DT as prctFromDt, A.MCHN_PRCT_ID as mchnPrctId, A.MCHN_INFO_ID as mchnInfoId, A.LAST_MDFY_ID as lastMdfyId, A.LAST_MDFY_DT as laskMdfyDt, A.FRST_RGST_ID as frstRgstId, A.FRST_RGST_DT as frstRgstDt, CONCAT(A.PRCT_FROM_DT, '~', A.PRCT_TO_DT) AS prctDt, C.TOOL_NM AS toolNm, B.SA_NAME as saName FROM IRIS_SPCE_MCHN_PRCT_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER B ON A.RGST_ID = B.SA_SABUN_NEW LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SPCE_MCHN_INFO_MGMT C ON A.MCHN_INFO_ID = C.MCHN_INFO_ID WHERE 1=1
AND B.SA_NAME LIKE '%'+#{saName}+'%'
AND C.TOOL_NM LIKE '%'+#{toolNm}+'%'
AND A.PRCT_TITL LIKE '%'+#{prctTitl}+'%'
AND A.PRCT_FROM_DT >= #{prctFromDt}
AND A.PRCT_TO_DT <= #{prctToDt}
ORDER BY prctDt
